seeTheDanger: See the danger before it strikes
sharkDetected: A shark detected in the area
shortIntroBody: Shark Detection is an innovative application designed to enhance beach safety by using AI-powered camera systems to detect sharks in real-time.
ourMissionBody: Our mission is to protect lives by providing early warnings of shark presence through smart surveillance technology, helping lifeguards and beachgoers stay safe.
howItWorksBody: The app connects with live camera feeds. YOLOv8 AI model analyzes the video to detect sharks. If a shark is detected, an alarm is triggered and a notification is sent instantly. The app also provides a live view from the camera for real-time monitoring.
technologyUsedBody: YOLOv8 for object detection. Jetson Device for edge processing. Firebase for real-time notification. Flutter for mobile interface. Supabase for image storage.
